Inspection Software & Mobile App for Multi Family Property Management

Advanced cloud based inspection software. Real time business intelligence dashboard into property conditions, cost and staff performance. Save 75% inspection time.

Start FREE Trial

Boost operational efficiency when it comes to Multi-Family property management. Manage your whole inspection process with our web app and our mobile apps allow for speedy data collection and recording of building/unit conditions along with cost analysis allowing you to view real time reports giving you the ability make data driven decisions. Create maintenance tasks that can integrate with your work order system.

Powerful Analytics

Interactive Dashboards

View your vacancies, maintenance costs, geography specific and critical inspection data. Issue actions from our interactive dashboard.

Boost Satisfaction

Boost satisfaction amongst residents, owners through real time visibility on inspection data across your portfolio.

Business Intelligence

SnapInspect delivers data to help you with Reporting, Analysis, Monitoring and Prediction.

Reduce Costs

Track maintenance expenses, property down time and other KPI's.

Manage Inspection Operations from the Cloud

  • Manage your inspections operations from one hub
  • View and edit all your inspections
  • Manage your portfolio and take advantage of email automation tools
  • Checklist Customization
  • Maintenance Management
  • Business Intelligence Dashboard
  • User Management
  • Checklist Set-Up
  • Bulk Upload Portfolio
  • Google Drive & Dropbox Integration
Check Out The Web App

Collect Inspection Data That YOU Need

SnapInspect's Mobile App is available on both iOS and Android. Bring your own checklists or use one of our templates. You will be able to collect inspection data faster than ever before saving you time and boosting productivity across teams. Record videos and annotate photos to help with pointing out issues and even create follow ups for them. Calculate costs and generate a pdf report or MS Word report with the push of a button.

  • Use multiple inspection types and forms
  • Conduct inspections onsite completely offline without internet
  • Use our pre-built industry proven checklist for property management inspections or bring your checklist over
  • Customized violations/ratings, write comments, scan documents, take photos, videos and signatures within the app
  • Side by Side comparison reports for Move In/Out OR start an inspection from previous inspection data
  • Photo Annotations, Auto Text, Voice Dictation and Smart Comments to avoid typing errors
  • Review and send reports from within the app & much more...
14 Day FREE Trial

Customized Forms and Inspection Reports

Use our pre-made industry proven templates to get you on the ground running. Or use our checklist editor to create your very own template. Impress your clients with a beautifully branded, professional and comprehensive report. Customize any visual element, any colour theme to match your branding requirements. Implement your own formula for costing and weighted scoring/grading calculations. Wondering if we can implement your report? Send it to us at:
reports@snapinspect.com

  • Move in / Move out
  • Safety and Regulations Inspections

14 Day FREE Trial

Smart Work Flow

A SnapInspect Only feature! Automate your post inspection tasks by setting up customisable triggers to streamline your inspection process and boost productivity.

Smarter Emails

Automate customisable emails to the owner to portray property conditions, to the tenant highlighting actionable issues, to the contractors for work order creation & follow up.

Maintenance Follow Up

Submit Maintenance Issues with information on Action Required, Priority and Photos + Videos to highlight the issue. Furthermore, integrate with your work order system.

Smarter Scheduling

Automatically schedule your next inspection based the inspection condition or from the custom trigger youâ€™ve set up.

Scoring/Calculations

Grade your inspections by assigning criteria that dictates the end condition of the property. Create your own formula to score inspections. Add a costing field to your checklist and let SnapInspect will do the maths for you.

work for you!
